summary:
An enhancement for the city of solitude. with new houses and much more. to make the city more citylike.
(No Texturechanges)
descriptionHtml:
IMPORTANT:

IMPORTANT:


NO HOUSECOLOUR OR OTHER TEXTURES COME WITH THIS FILE
(I had the sexy solitude version by "horrorview" installed while taking the pictures.)



To give Solitude a little more city feeling I added several new things to it.

see in the Video or read in the description.

[youtube]pDlHCHd-epQ[/youtube]

(Video is version 1)

New Version is out!!!

------------------->New Version 0.95<---------------------

contains:
- thiefs Lair
- two new followers
- Castle improvement
- small updates and improvements bugfixes
- guard on the wall in solitude that leads to the castle


WHAT IS NEW?

-5 new buildings
-included a school of magic and
-a House for you with roommates near the windmill
-trees and flora added to the city,
-an imperial tavern,
-new persons, like merchants, trainers and citizen
-and so on


COMPATIBLE with:
-mostly all texturemods for solitude
-Solitude Docs district (should be no problem)
-with most interrior mods for solitude (I changed no existing interiors)
-Solitude Underhome
-Crowded Solitude V5 by Velvokay (should be)


BUGS:
Everything is Wip, so please let me know what you think about it and report any bugs and so on.

- In some games it appears that there is a bug with the Guards, I havent noticed it so far...

So enjoy Solitude and have fun!
author: Freeedy

files.name: Solitude enhanced New Version
files.changelogHtml:
A Thiefs hideout in solitude
Two new Followers
Bugfixes
Castledour overhaul
some little changes
